branchCategory.name: ITV1000/2000/3000, Electro-Pneumatic Regulator
branchCategory.description: <p>Series ITV electro-pneumatic and electronic vacuum regulators control air/vacuum pressure steplessly in proportion to an electric signal. They are light weight in design with a bright and easy to read LED display. The monitor output is available either as analog output or switch output. The ITV series is IP65 equivalent.</p>
